rounds.observation:
[GAME] Welcome to the Chess Arena! You are commanding the White pieces in this strategic battle.
Your mission is to checkmate your opponent's king through tactical superiority.
Execute your strategic moves using UCI notation within square brackets.
Example: '[d2d4]' advances your pawn to establish central control.

Invalid moves include same-square moves (e.g. [e8e8]) and moves to squares you cannot reach. Always double-check your move format and ensure the move is legal in the current position.
